author: sky.cactus
content: I personally find it incredibly annoying when the server responds in a language I told them I don't understand.  So many things have broken for me in client dev because a server doesn't respect the handshake.

author: sky.cactus
content: Most often this is in the form of an API that returns HTML in error responses (usually because they have some edge termination server that errorud instead of the server I am actually talking to).
